rukus.text: 1|5|[Parvardigoro] Tanho Turo meparastem va tanho az Tu jori mecuem
1|6|Moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat farmo [va hamvora soʙitqadam ʙigardon]
1|7|Rohi kasone [hamcun pajomʙaron, sahidon, rostgujon va nakukoron], ki ʙa onon ne'mat dodai va dar zumrai ƣazaʙsudagon [jahudijon] va gumrohon [masehijon] nestand
